prompts: Create a Pokemon that embodies the essence of nature with vibrant green scales and floral patterns.
Imagine a small, playful creature with bright blue fur and mischievous purple spots.
Design a Pokemon with a sleek, agile body covered in shimmering shades of teal and lavender.
Generate a water-type Pokemon with flowing fins and a graceful, serpentine shape.
Show me a Pokemon that can camouflage perfectly in a forest with earthy and leafy colors.
Make a fierce-looking Pokemon that has striking red eyes and a spiked back.
Give me a cute, cuddly Pokemon with round features and pastel colors.
